rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with natural light and an open design. Vastu-aligned to promote positive energy.
Spacious living room adjoining the courtyard for social gatherings, with large windows to allow abundant natural light.
A dining space integrated with the kitchen and living room, designed for family meals in a Vastu-compliant layout.
Functional kitchen space with modern amenities, placed near the dining area to ensure efficient circulation as per Vastu guidelines.
The master bedroom with attached bathroom. Features ample closet space and a window for natural light; designed to ensure privacy and positive energy flow.
Guest bedroom located near the master bedroom with Vastu-compliant orientation for relaxation.
Child room designed with safety and ample space in mind, oriented in a positive direction per Vastu principles.
Additional family entertainment space that can serve as a study or relaxation zone, ensuring balanced energy flow.
Private gym area equipped with fitness equipment and natural ventilation. Vastu-aligned to ensure a healthy environment for exercise.
Storage room for household items, located conveniently near the kitchen and living areas.
